title: 不割 但希望檢討 親身經驗

replies.msg:
我係P牌不過絕對係親身經驗
完全冇目的要帶任何風向

一收工即刻碌咗入嚟機場@2030
行到去北面離境大堂
見到一個外籍女士面色好忐忑
大概你都知道佢好想入閘
硬着頭皮過去問佢

me
the lady

: sorry for any inconvenience caused
: I understand and support what you guys fighting for, I been living in hk for nine years but I need to be on plane back to London for my mums funeral, I can show you my boarding pass and proof of my mums funeral
: sorry sorry! You don’t need to show the proof to me, I do trust u, pls wait and let me ask for the update information

我行埋去問封住喺離境大堂對出嘅一啲巴打
幾乎嘅答案一致都係入唔到去㗎啦

: I just asked it seems all security staff has gone and no one can pass through the gate right now
: (crying) I been here since 4pm and I got the news from my pilot friend that my flight hasn’t been cancelled even it shows “cancelled” on the notification board, I just wanna be home for my mums funeral.
: I feel sorry about it! how about I go with u to find if any CX staff could help?

就係咁我同佢行左幾轉來回南北門，除咗搵唔到ground staff外，亦都見唔到入閘嘅可能性

最後
: maybe u have to consider another flight from Macau or Shenzhen to London as the 2nd plan
: (crying)
佢慢慢消失係我眼前

巴打絲打們，我到呢刻個心仲拿住拿住
我知道抗爭就一定有犧牲
但係大家係咪可以賽後檢討一下點樣可以做好啲
嗰班人係警察扮示威者 煽動架 好明顯

自推
大家要改變策略
凝聚最大民意 818
